title: Leaver Buster
body:
I'm not sure where to post this. I don't play that often.

Basically I've been placed in lower priority queue because I disconnect more than I should due to crumby internet in the evenings. I'm fine with the penalties of a 20 minute wait but the problem is after waiting the 20 minutes it never connects to a game. How am I supposed to play out these 5 penalty games without actually ever being able to join a game??

I've waited the 20 minute penalty plus another 30 minutes 3 times now and I still don't get put through to champion select.

Now I only play ARAM because I just enjoy having fun and only DC due to unforeseeable net issues. 

I'd really like you to look into this because I'd like to get these penalty queues over with. (again the problem is you literally can't)

Could you also think about throwing in compensation? Because your 20 minute waiting times are actually infinite because I haven't been able to join a game at all. Just wave the penalties.

My IGN is Swarley. Thank you./
{{champion:56}}

replies.body: It's against policy to remove any penalties given out by the system, under any circumstances. If you're experiencing troubles connecting to 'Active game's, then you should probably repair/upgrade your internet connection. What ISP are you with, and how are you connected to the net?
